name: TP for my Bunghole
description:
Controls
WASD: To move around 
Mouse: To rotate the camera

Objective
Collect as much Toilet paper as you can, while trying to avoid crashing with other mannequins.

Credits
Programming:      @El_fideo_rubio
Music and  SFX:  Waxwolf
2D Web Design:   Aurelio Pennica

Toilet Paper model: Blender 3D https://sketchfab.com/3d-models/simple-toilet-paper-7ca7ebcfad964498b49af73be442acf9
